Address_en: 158 Hammer Hill Road, Diamond Hill, Kowloon
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• Covered Spectator Stand (about 2200 seats in total)
  • Floodlight System
  • Car Park with 7 parking spaces
  • Changing Room
  • Toilet
  • Locker
  • Drinking Fountain
  • Light Refreshment Kiosk
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Accessible Lift (with Assistive Listening System), Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 有蓋觀眾看台 (共約2200個座位)
  • 泛光燈照明系統
  • 設有 7個泊車位的停車場
  • 更衣室
  • 洗手間
  • 儲物櫃
  • 飲水器
  • 小食亭
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、暢通易達升降機 (設有廣播裝置)、觸覺引路帶、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
Opening_hours_cn: 每日上午8時至晚上10時30分

Address_en: Sports Road, Happy Valley, Hong Kong
Ancillary_facilities_en: Men's and ladies' Changing rooms and toilets (including accessible toilets)
Ancillary_facilities_cn: 男、女更衣室及洗手間 (設有暢通易達洗手間)
Remarks_en:
• Closed during horse races and barrier trial in Happy Valley Racecourse
  • Closed every Tuesday for maintenance
Remarks_cn:
• 在跑馬地賽馬日及試閘時段暫停使用
  • 逢星期二草地保養日暫停使用

Address_en: 63 Boundary Street, Sham Shui Po, Kowloon
Address_cn: 九龍深水埗界限街 63 號
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• Men's and ladies' changing rooms and toilets
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 男、女更衣室及洗手間
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖

Name_en: Wai Lok Street Temporary Soccer Pitch
Address_en: Wai Yip Street and Wai Lok Street junction, Kwun Tong, Kowloon (near Laguna Park)
Address_cn: 九龍觀塘偉業街與偉樂街交界（近麗港公園）
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• Changing facilities（showering facilities are not provided）
  • Portable toilets
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet (Portable), Tactile Guide Path
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 更衣室（不設淋浴設施）
  • 流動廁所
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間（流動廁所）、觸覺引路帶
Opening_hours_cn: 每日上午8時至下午6時（星期一除外）
